No deadline—just gentle self-care when you remember.

agent_utterance:
Totally okay to pause hydration today. If you want something very tiny and optional, try one of these when you feel ready:
- Micro-routine (pick one):
  • 1 minute of slow breathing with grounding (name 5 things you see, 4 you can touch, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, 1 you can taste).
  • 1 minute of a gentle stretch (neck and shoulders) or a quick hand stretch.
- Micro-snack (optional):
  • If something small feels tolerable, you could try one tiny item such as a single grape, a bite-sized piece of fruit, or one plain cracker—only if it feels safe and not aversive.

No pressure, no deadlines—you're allowed to revisit this later, and I’m here to support you kindly.
